OTP_PIN:
Welcome! You need to activate your account.
Enter One time pin(OTP) sent to you via sms
CONFIRM_NEW_PIN:
Confirm your new 5-digit pin by entering again

00 for previous menu
CONFIRM_NEW_PIN1:
Confirm your new 5-digit pin by entering again

00 for previous menu
LOGIN:
Welcome to market sales. Please select an option
1.Buy bus ticket
2.Login
3.Reset Pin
ENTER_PIN:
Please enter your 5-digit pin to login

00 for previous menu
MAIN:
Welcome to market sales {Marketeer}
1.Make a sale
2.Order goods
3.Sale bus ticket 
4.Pay market fees 
5.Check sales
6.Change pin
NOT_REGISTERED:
Mobile number {msisdn} is not registered as a trader. Please register as a trader!
#.Main menu
TRADER_BLOCKED: Your account is blocked. Please see the Market Administrator!
TRADER_BLOCKED1: This traders account is blocked. They need to see the Market Administrator!

Enter total sale amount

Enter # for main menu
MAKE_SALE_BUYER_MOBILE:
Enter the buyers mobile number i.e 09xxxxxxxx

Enter 00 for previous menu or # for main menu

Make a sale to buyer with mobile number {msisdn} for a total of K{amount}.
1.Confirm
00.Previous menu

Enter # for Main menu
